reasoning: NLPHL represents approximately 5-7% of all Hodgkin lymphoma cases. Global Hodgkin lymphoma incidence is ~2.5 per 100k per year (per GLOBOCAN data). Estimated NLPHL incidence at ~0.15 per 100k (~12,000 cases annually). Moderate confidence due to rarity and limited population-based registry data specifically tracking this subtype.
source: GLOBOCAN 2012 (Hodgkin lymphoma aggregate), supplemented with SEER histological subtype distributions
